title: marudagiri murugan
sahitya:
marudagiri murugan tiru nAmattai dinam karudi vara maravAdiru manamE nI


anupallavi

  oru pOdum aDiyArai siridEnum maravAdu parivODu avaruyyap-pAlittu varum ayyan


caraNam    sharaNam enavE oru muraiyEnum uraittu varuvOrkk-abhayam vazhangi varuvOn
karuNai surandaruL purindE sirandiDum varadanAi irundu viLangi varuvOn
